Package org.klotski.coding

Class FileRead

java.lang.Object
org.klotski.coding.FileRead
public class FileRead extends Object
FileRead reads a saved file to get information about the game to restore.
It connects to [name_of_the_user].txt that has to have this form:
 {
     [int_Configuration]
     [int_selected1] [int_direction1]
     [int_selected2] [int_direction2]
     [int_selected3] [int_direction3]
     ...
     [int_Timer] [int_Moves_Number]
 }
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrea Mutti, Alessandro Girlanda, Alba Casanica, Matteo Meneghin
